channel.title: Npc problems
channel.description:
ok so...i go to npcdrops.java and insert [code]#Ice_Queen 10021:30 555:1000 560:100 560:1000 565:1000 565:444 4710:1 4710:1 995:100000 995:1000000 1580:1[/code]
and i get this [code] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10021 at server.models.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops<NPCDrops.java:43> atserver.models.npcs.NPCDrops.<init><NPCDrops.java:15> at server.Server.<clinit><Server.java:71>[/code]
I cann add certain npcs but i mainly npcs that have id 8900 or lower somethin like that btw idk how to do that code insert thing and im using project insanity
